bibl.title: Philagris, Perkethaut and Hermoupolis: Three Villages or One?
bibl.note: I. Philagris. - II. Pr-grg-Dhwty. - III. Perkethaut. - IV. Hermou Polis. - V. Conclusion. The three names mentioned correspond to two villages in the south-west of the Themistou meris. Perkethaut / Philagris can be identified with Hamuli. The village Hermou Polis was a distinct entity.
CLARYSSE Willy and Bart VAN BEEK, Philagris, Perkethaut and Hermoupolis: Three Villages or One?
